name: MAD
body:
MAD
===

A simple rebar-compatible dependency manager.

Goals
-----

It shall:

* be compatible with rebar configuration.
* be as small and fast as possible.

Build
-----

    $ make

And put 'mad' to PATH.

Usage
-----

    $ mad get-deps
    $ mad compile

Credits
-------

* Maxim Sokhatsky
* Sina Samavati

OM A HUM
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
